name: TheDailyBrainTattooFromJonnyHatesMarketing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Grab your daily ear-squirt of effortless marketing juice from the legendary Jonny Cooper, UK 8-figure entrepreneur, piano-player, international racecar driver and founder of JonnyHatesMarketing.com, helping transformation professionals find more of their ideal clients more easily, without paying for advertising.

This flash briefing features a daily tip, trick, inspiration or hack that Jonny has developed over years of building and selling successful businesses, and in consulting with other businessmen and business women to help do the same for their companies.

Jonny has coached corporations around the world, helping his clients generate new leads, new business and new profits. 

Are you ready to take your side business to the next level? The Jonny Hates Marketing Minute will motivate you to launch or grow a business you love. The Jonny Hates Marketing Minute with Jonny Cooper will give you the tools you need to create both income and impact.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
